title: Kun Tun Tianxia Zhi Zhang Men Guilai
overview: Fan Lingxiao, a spiritual pet master with exceptional talents, was plotted against during the Level-A sect promotion competition and was devoured by Kun, his own spiritual pet. When he opened his eyes again, he found himself reincarnated into a young man named "Liu Fengmang" and was imprisoned in the White Mansion's dungeon. Meanwhile, his own sect, Lingxiao Pavilion, was in a perilous state. To uncover the truth of being devoured by Kun and revitalize his sect, Fan Lingxiao, accompanied by his existing spiritual pets, embarked on a brand-new adventure journey with Gu Ling, Cheng Xi, and Yue Tong.
